name: Transmogrify v 1
description:
Treansmogrify is a Local Multiplayer topdown view Game were you hunt has a team or terrorize it has a monster! The game is divided in two fazes. The first one you play against your friends until the clock runs out of time or one of you reaches one hundred points! The player who meets this requirements will become a monster and will try to kill the other three players and vice-versa! This is the first version of the game. We are currently working on a new game art, some partical effects as well as mapselect and playerselect screens. This will give you an idea of how the game will eventually turn out featurig currently only some of the mecanics that will be featured soon.... Enjoy and of course don't forget to give us your feedback.

PS: 

this is the current list of commands (we are sorry there is no  controller feature available yet but we are currently facing some bugs in implementing them. Will be available in the next version).

P1:

Movement-wasd

attack-e

P2:

Movement-fthg

attack-y

P3:

Movement-jilk

attack-o

P4:

Movement- arrow keys

attack- num lck + end
